definitions.meaning: to gain; to get; to acquire

sentences.simplifiedText: 你需要打工来获取这些物品。
sentences.traditionalText: 你需要打工來獲取這些物品。
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xūyào dǎgōng lái huòqǔ zhèxiē wùpǐn.
sentences.translation: You need to work to acquire these items.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他在成功磨练他的技巧并获取了他所需要的知识以获得这次机会，他尝试寻找恰当的机会来证明他的价值。
sentences.traditionalText: 他在成功磨練他的技巧並獲取了他所需要的知識以獲得這次機會，他嘗試尋找恰當的機會來證明他的價值。
sentences.pinyin: Tā zài chénggōng móliàn tā de jìqiǎo bìng huòqǔle tā suǒ xūyào de zhīshì yǐ huòdé zhè cì jīhuì, tā chángshì xúnzhǎo qiàdàng de jīhuì lái zhèngmíng tā de jiàzhí.
sentences.translation: He has successfully honed his skills and acquired the knowledge he needed to seize this opportunity, he tries to find a proper chance to prove his worth.
